net.corda.core.node

Interface ServicesForResolution

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AppServiceHub, ServiceHub
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockServices

    @DoNotImplement
public ServicesForResolution

    Subset of node services that are used for loading transactions from the wire into fully resolved, looked up forms ready for verification.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServicesForResolution

        public ServicesForResolution()

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentityService

        @NotNull
IdentityService getIdentityService()

        An identity service maintains a directory of parties by their associated distinguished name/public keys and thus supports lookup of a party given its key, or name. The service also manages the certificates linking confidential identities back to the well known identity (i.e. the identity in the network map) of a party.

      • getAttachments

        @NotNull
AttachmentStorage getAttachments()

        Provides access to storage of arbitrary JAR files (which may contain only data, no code).

      • getCordappProvider

        @NotNull
CordappProvider getCordappProvider()

        Provides access to anything relating to cordapps including contract attachment resolution and app context

      • getNetworkParametersService

        @NotNull
NetworkParametersService getNetworkParametersService()

        Provides access to historical network parameters that are used in transaction resolution.

      • getNetworkParameters

        @NotNull
NetworkParameters getNetworkParameters()

        Returns the network parameters the node is operating under.

      • loadState

        @NotNull
TransactionState<?> loadState(@NotNull
                                       StateRef stateRef)

        Given a class StateRef loads the referenced transaction and looks up the specified output interface ContractState.

        WARNING Do not use this method unless you really only want a single state - any batch loading should go through loadStates as repeatedly calling loadState can lead to repeat deserialsiation work and severe performance degradation.

        Throws:
        TransactionResolutionException - if stateRef points to a non-existent transaction.
        See Also:
        class StateRef, interface ContractState, loadStates, loadState

      • loadStates

        @NotNull
java.util.Set<net.corda.core.contracts.StateAndRef> loadStates(@NotNull
                                                                        java.util.Set<net.corda.core.contracts.StateRef> stateRefs)

        Given a Set of class StateRef's loads the referenced transaction and looks up the specified output interface ContractState.

        Throws:
        TransactionResolutionException - if stateRef points to a non-existent transaction.
        See Also:
        Set, class StateRef, interface ContractState

      • loadContractAttachment

        @NotNull
Attachment loadContractAttachment(@NotNull
                                           StateRef stateRef)

        Returns the interface Attachment that defines the given class StateRef, which must be in the visible subset of the ledger.

        See Also:
        interface Attachment, class StateRef

      • specialise

        @NotNull
LedgerTransaction specialise(@NotNull
                                      LedgerTransaction ltx)

        Provides a callback for the Node to customise the class LedgerTransaction.

        See Also:
        class LedgerTransaction
